content: PFF Panel 1 Seedly PFF 2019 CPF Asked by Nicholas SchuesterAsked on 02 Mar 2019Cheng Chuan says we can save $1M in 35+ years for retirement. But now with CPF Life how do you take the money out?2 answersAnswerBump5
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Loo Cheng Chuan, Founder at 1M65 MovementLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 05 Mar 2019Please Google to find out how CPF life works. There is a lot of misunderstanding to how it operates. In a nutshell, you can take out anything above the FRS minimum sum, and the rest be taken out as an annuity.0 comments0

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 03 Mar 2019After setting aside the FRS, you can withdraw the rest of the money at age 55. The CPF Life will also pay you every month at 65 until you die.0 comments0
